title: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale game developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on February 4, 2019, without any prior announcement or marketing. The game shares the same engine as Titanfall 2 and uses the same gameplay mechanics, including wall-running and double-jumping. The game is set in the Titanfall universe, taking place after the events of Titanfall 2. The game features a cast of characters who are playable in a battle royale game mode, with each character having their own unique abilities and playstyles. The game was met with positive reception from critics, who praised the gameplay, graphics, and the game's free-to-play model. The game has been a commercial success, with over 50 million players in its first month. The game has received several updates since its release, including a new battle pass system, a new map, and a new character.
